summary: ***** WHEN VENTILATED SEAT FEATURE IS TURNED ON, THERE IS TREMENDOUS HEAT THAT BEGINS TO BUILD IN THE MIDDLE/LOWER SEAT BACK. HEAT IS ALSO BEING FELT ON THE UPPER RIGHT SHOULDER OF THE BOLSTER. THIS IS CAUSING SUCH AN ISSUE THAT I AM HAVING TO LEAN FORWARD WHILE DRIVING TO AVOID THE HEAT BUILD-UP THAT 2 ACCIDENTS HAVE ALMOST OCCURRED. I AM CONCERNED THAT THE SEAT MAY CATCH FIRE !!!! THIS NEEDS TO BE FIXED IMMEDIATELY!!!! THIS HAPPENES AT ANYTIME WHETHER DRIVING OR STATIONARY.
